posts.title: Well done!
posts.body: Nice job setting up a server! I hope you create more in the future!!

posts.title: Good Job!
posts.body: I look forward to your future creations. Good job on getting this server up and running and sticking through it. Server making isnt the easiest thing and takes time to learn! Keep it up!
posts.author: D3str0y

posts.title: Borgor <3 !
posts.body: Borgor is good and yummy, it fills my tummy , yay borgor!
posts.author: Zarymur

posts.title: ShaD HP Review
posts.body: Hey all! JesterMan.exe here, checking out my friend ShaDis's server! Super clean and compact, and having an easy to access BBS is always a treat. I give it 5 Stars! Awesome job dude, keep up the great content, and stay safe!     -JesterMan.exe
posts.author: JesterM

posts.body: Train is online, have fun everyone. Expect a coffee shop soon so you can relax before your travels!
posts.title: All aboard!
posts.author: Luigi

posts.title: Always Connect
posts.body: BN3 ACDC is now FULLY linked to this HP please travel back and forth as much as you wish!
posts.author: D3str0y

posts.title: What a place!
posts.body: Quetzen! What a place! It's like coming out of the train station, and you get to see the enormous open space of a lobby! I like how the place is built up, and I hope it will be expanded in the future! It's always fun to see creativity that matches that of veterans, so to seepotent wisdom put into application is a boon! Oh, I hear my train coming, so until next time!
posts.author: Quetzen
